content: this crochet pattern is inspired by the grub character from the *hollow knight* video game get ready to crochet the cutest collectible creature and feel free to take a peek at the grub on my youtube 1 channel *let me know if you have any questions and enjoy * **language ** english & us terminology **format ** pdf with written directions and pictures **skill level ** easy/intermediate **materials ** weight 4 yarn in a primary green secondary green cream and black <50g per color 3 75 mm f crochet hook or preferred polyester fiber fill tapestry needle for sewing scissors stitch marker if desired **finished size ** the grub measures approximately 6 75 inches in height and weighs around 50 grams in total **stitches/techniques used ** magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease sc4tog - single_crochet four together fsc - foundation single_crochet *optional* **a note on copyright** the pattern instructions and images are © creations realized 2025 you are welcome to use adapt or modify this pattern creativity is encouraged but please credit me creations realized as the pattern designer please do not copy share or claim this pattern as your own in any form *thank you so much for your support with no further ado happy realizing * 1 https //youtube com/shorts/4n38m1bfnik si=ftjbasxlxih190aq
